name: AppRating
summary: A simple yet powerful App Review Manager for iOS in Swift 3. Now supporting SKStoreReviewController API. Based on ArmChair.
description:
A simple yet powerful App Review Manager for iOS and OSX in Swift.
* 100% Swift 4
* First and only App Rating Library that supports SKStoreReviewController
* Fully Configurable at Runtime
* Default Localizations for Dozens of Languages
* Easy to Setup
